column4: hello i have an issue with karmic : my wireless card is detected but i cannot see any network, the status shows disconnected. on aspire one. any idea?
hello i have an issue with karmic : my wireless card is detected but i cannot see any network, the status shows disconnected. on aspire one. any idea?
what wireless device?
well, there's a lot of atheros chipsets, which one
lspci will show it i'd imagine
are you using 32 or 64bit?.. i have that same device and it works out of the box, nothing required
hmm, thats odd.
i wouldn't think so, have you installed anything weird?
i deny them by default
anything i can do to at least find out the issue ? any diagnostic tool ?
not really sure.. you can try madwifi.
- madwifi drivers work on karmic ? in jaunty they didnt work for me at all
i don't know, was just suggesting to have a look.. did the device work on the 9.10 live cd?.. or did you upgrade
actually i didn an upgrade at first but it screwed my system so i did a fresh 9.10 install after
but did your wireless work on the live cd?
not sure whether the wireless worked out of the box, i stayed wired to reinstall all the softs i wanted first and that only after that i noticed i did not have wireless anymore
so you are saying i should try again the live cd and see if it works ?
yes, boot the live CD, for 9.10.. and see if you have wireless
ok let me try that first ill come back here later
if live cd works for wifi what can i do to fix the issue ?

well, now that i don't know.. unless you went off doing some weird crap(blacklisting, or something like that), your wireless should work, cuz like i said, i have that same device, and its working fine for me
no i did not do any blacklisting
i'm not saying just blacklisting, i'm saying unless you installed something that disabled it somehow, its unlikely, but possible
i see... well let me check the live cd as said
